    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Lociranje bližnje točke</string>
            <string language="en">Location of near point</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Standort des nahen Punktes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Emplacement de point proche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Posição do ponto próximo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Posizione di punto vicino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέση του κοντινού σημείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Localización de la punta cercana</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Optično delovanje očesa ter spreminjanje goriščne razdalje očesa pri bližnih predmetih.</string>
            <string language="en">Optical anatomy of human eye and change of eye's focal point when viewing objects that are near.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">oko</string>
            <string language="en">eye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">goriščna razdalja</string>
            <string language="en">focal length</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">optična aplikacija</string>
            <string language="en">optical application</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optische Anatomie des menschlichen Auges und 
Änderung des Schwerpunktes des Auges, wenn Nachrichten angesehen 
werden, die nahe sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anatomie optique d'oeil humain et changement du 
point focal de l'oeil en visualisant les objets qui sont près.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Anatomy ótico do olho humano e mudança do ponto
focal do olho ao ver os objetos que estão próximo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anatomia ottica dell'occhio umano e cambiamento 
del punto focale dell'occhio quando osservano gli oggetti che sono 
vicino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οπτική ανατομία του ανθρώπινου ματιού και αλλαγή του 
σημείου εστίασης του ματιού κατά το όψη των αντικειμένων που 
είναι πλησίον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Anatomía óptica del ojo humano y cambio del 
punto focal del ojo al ver los objetos que están cerca.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fokale Länge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Anwendung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comprimento focal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aplicação ótica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aplicación óptica</string>
